sections.heading: Short title; purpose. This Act may be cited as the State of Illinois Recreational Use of Leased Land Act.
sections.text: Short title; purpose. This Act may be cited as the State of Illinois Recreational Use of Leased Land Act.

sections.heading: Definitions. As used in this Act, unless the context otherwise requires:
sections.text: Definitions. As used in this Act, unless the context otherwise requires:

sections.heading: No duty. Except as specifically recognized by or provided in Section 15 of this Act, an owner-lessor of leased land shall not be liable for injury of any kind to any person who enters the leased land for a recreational use, except for willful and wanton misconduct
sections.text: The owner-lessor of leased land ow

sections.heading: Willful and wanton failure; charge for entry. Nothing in this Act limits in any way any liability which otherwise exists:
sections.text: Willful and wanton failure; charge for entry. Nothing in this Act limits in any way any liability which otherwise exists:

sections.heading: Construction. Nothing in this Act shall be construed to:
sections.text: Construction. Nothing in this Act shall be construed to:

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
